pageProduct.name: Sukin Hydration Hydrafusion Night Cream 60ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Quench Thirsty Skin Overnight With Our Light Cream.

Warnings

Avoid Contact With Eyes. If Irritation Occurs Rinse Immediately And Discontinue Use. For External Use Only.

Common Uses

Quench Thirsty Skin Overnight With Our Light Cream. Sukin’S Bio-Marine Blend Of Sea Algae, Hyaluronic Acid & Maize Complex Will Keep Your Skin Smooth And Refreshed, While Also Providing Deep Hydration Lasting For 72 Hours.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Coco-Caprylate, Cetearyl Olivate, Glycerin, Sorbitan Olivate, Saccharide Isomerate (Maize Complex), Sodium Hyaluronate, Ascophyllum Nodosum Extract (Kelp), Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, Fragrance (Parfum)*, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene**, Citral**, Linalool**.

Directions

After Cleansing At Night, Gently Massage Into Face, Neck And Décolletage.
